metadata.title: CVE-2017-9119 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The i_zval_ptr_dtor function in Zend/zend_variables.h in PHP 7.1.5 allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact by triggering craftedoperations on array data structures.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9119` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm3
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm3
php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm3

criterions.comment: php7.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.16+esm3').
